meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the family Papaveraceae, commonly known as bleeding hearts.
meanings.sent1: The dicentras in the garden have beautiful heart-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted dicentras in my backyard to add color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The dicentras in the flower bed seem to be shy, hiding their blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening bloomed like the dicentras in spring.
meanings.sent5: The delicate dicentras swayed gently in the breeze, captivating all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The common name for any plant belonging to the genus Dicentra.
meanings.sent1: I saw a dicentras plant at the nursery and decided to buy it.
meanings.sent2: Dicentras are known for their unique and elegant flowers.
meanings.sent3: The dicentras in the garden whispered secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the garden like the dicentras' beauty.
meanings.sent5: The dicentras added a touch of magic to the otherwise ordinary garden.
